title: CrossChainMessenger: Support multiple withdrawals
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
The CrossChainMessenger is [known to not support multiple withdrawals](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/develop/packages/sdk/src/cross-chain-messenger.ts#L432). This creates a problem for use cases like Bridges that often do have these sorts of L2 transactions containing multiple withdrawals.

**To Reproduce**
Example [L2 txn](https://optimistic.etherscan.io/tx/0xd73f0cdf499830f2919f3009cee35611abf5a01842c4eed0e8c2493a00969a5b)

**Expected behavior**
```
Error: multiple withdrawals found in receipt
    at CrossChainMessenger.toLowLevelMessage (/Users/nicholaspai/UMA/relayer-v2/node_modules/@eth-optimism/sdk/src/cross-chain-messenger.ts:439:15)
    at runMicrotasks (<anonymous>)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:96:5)
    at async CrossChainMessenger.getMessageStatus (/Users/nicholaspai/UMA/relayer-v2/node_modules/@eth-optimism/sdk/src/cross-chain-messenger.ts:668:30)
```

**System Specs:**
 - Package Version (or commit hash): `"@eth-optimism/sdk": "^2.1.0"`
